name: Fructoïd
short_description:
The Fructoïd is 
	    an opensource free naïve game for Android OS.
	    The name "Fructoïd" itself has
	    origins in ukrainian language and can
	    be translated as "fruit eater".
	    	    
	    The game\'s goal is to eat all the strawberries
	    avoiding peppers. When you eat (touch) a 
	    piece of a strawberry you score a point.
	    When you eat a piece of a pepper you lose
	    ten points. When you mis a target you
	    lose a point.
	    
	    The game\'s source is at sourceforge.net.
	    The main purpose of the game source code is
	    that it can
	    be used as a pedagogical material
	    for future software engineers.

	    If you are interested in the future game
	    development feel free to contact me
	    through pigovsky@gmail.com, http://www.facebook.com/pigovsky
	    https://twitter.com/YuriyPigovsky or http://vk.com/id86376190
summary: Fructoïd is an opensource free naïve game for Android OS.
